name: Micro Blitz - BCJ4 Entry
description:
What is Micro Blitz?

 Micro Blitz is a wario-ware style microgame collection. Your goal is to complete as many games within your 3 lives as you can. I made this as my entry for the Beginner's Circle Jam 4, and there's a grand total of.....7 microgames to play....

 I definitely over scoped for my first game jam as I'm still learning the engine, so the game isn't quite where I'd like it to be, but I accomplished most of my learning goals with this jam. Probably going to enter with a team next time so I can focus on what I'm good at. 

Thank you to angrysmile for putting together this jam and the BCJ community  for being  friendly and welcoming to beginner game devs.
